title: 3D Printed Brick
description: I designed and modeled a 2x4 Lego Brick using the Autodesk Fusion 360 software and 3D printing it using Afinia Studio and an Afinia H400+ 3D printer as part of a design project in my Engineering Class.

title: Lego Mass Launcher
description: Our group was tasked to build a Lego Mass Launcher designed to launch a projectile  away from the launcher using only potential energy. We also had to find the initial launch velocity by collecting data and using basic principles of projectile motion.

title: Lego Drag Racer
description: Our group built a Lego Drag Racer to compete with our class for the fastest race. We analyzed factors like wheel size, gear ratios, and motor count using Vernier Graphical Analysis and modeled performance in MATLAB to predict the best setup.

title: Lego Sumo Robot
description: In this project, I and Autumn Ludwig were tasked to make a Lego sumo robot with three motors that could fit a 12 in x 12 in x 12 in box. This robot will compete against other robots in our class for two rounds of competition in the ring where 2 robots have to fight to push each other off the table edge.
